results.prompt: Transcribe math as LaTeX when clear; keep original text for body.
results.output_text: Transcribe math as LaTeX when clear; keep original text for body.

results.prompt: If tables are present, render them as GitHub-flavored Markdown; otherwise read text.
results.output_text: If tables are present, render them as GitHub-flavored Markdown; otherwise read text.

results.prompt: Provide a concise one-sentence summary of the page content.
results.output_text: Provide a concise one-sentence summary of the page content. A

results.prompt: Analyze the page image and output STRICT JSON with keys: {"page_type": ["table"|"equation"|"figure"|"text"|"mixed"], "tables_md": [], "equations_latex": [], "caption": "", "text": ""}. Rules: 1) If the page is predominantly a TABLE and small enough, transcribe it exactly as GitHub-Flavored Markdown into tables_md. 2) If the page is predominantly EQUATIONS with little body text, transcribe equations into equations_latex (LaTeX). 3) If the layout is MIXED or too large to reproduce, do NOT hallucinate; return a short caption and key body text; keep tables_md/equations_latex empty. Always return valid JSON and no text outside JSON.
results.output_text: Analyze the page image and output STRICT JSON with keys: {"page_type": ["table"|"equation"|"figure"|"text"|"mixed"], "tables_md": [], "equations_latex": [], "caption": "", "text": ""}. Rules: 1) If the page is predominantly a TABLE and small enough, transcribe it exactly as GitHub-Flavored Markdown into tables_md. 2) If the page is predominantly EQUATIONS with little body text, transcribe equations into equations_latex (LaTeX). 3) If the layout is MIXED or too large to reproduce, do NOT hallucinate; return a short caption and key body text; keep tables_md/equations_latex empty. Always return valid JSON and no text outside JSON.WBr

results.prompt: Classify the page layout. Output STRICT JSON ONLY with keys: {"is_table": bool, "is_equation": bool, "is_figure": bool,  "is_text": bool, "dominant": "table|equation|figure|text|mixed",  "table_size": "none|small|large", "confidence": number}.
results.output_text: Classify the page layout. Output STRICT JSON ONLY with keys: {"is_table": bool, "is_equation": bool, "is_figure": bool, "is_text": bool, "dominant": "table|equation|figure|text|mixed", "table_size": "none|small|large", "confidence": number}.

output_json.text_sequence: Classify the page layout. Output STRICT JSON ONLY with keys: {"is_table": bool, "is_equation": bool, "is_figure": bool, "is_text": bool, "dominant": "table|equation|figure|text|mixed", "table_size": "none|small|large", "confidence": number}.</s>

results.prompt: Transcribe visible equations using LaTeX; keep inline math inline; do not invent symbols.
results.output_text: Transcribe visible equations using LaTeX; keep inline math inline; do not invent symbols.

results.prompt: Extract all tables as GitHub-Flavored Markdown. Preserve headers, numbers, and punctuation exactly. Do not summarize.
results.output_text: Extract all tables as GitHub-Flavored Markdown. Preserve headers, numbers, and punctuation exactly. Do not summarize.

results.prompt: If the table is wide, split into multiple Markdown tables by logical sections. Preserve header rows; avoid wrapping cell content.
results.output_text: If the table is wide, split into multiple Markdown tables by logical sections. Preserve header rows; avoid wrapping cell content.

results.prompt: Summarize the figure with up to 5 bullet points: (1) key entities, (2) relationships, (3) notable labels/values.
results.output_text: Summarize the figure with up to 5 bullet points: (1) key entities, (2) relationships, (3) notable labels/values.
